title: Magnificent 7 Earnings: Good or Bad?
text: Of the six members of ‘The Magnificent 7' group that have already reported June-quarter results, the market was disappointed with Tesla TSLA, Alphabet GOOGL, Microsoft MSFT, and Amazon AMZN. Conversely, it was okay with Apple's AAPL quarterly release and loved Meta's META results.

title: Tech stocks wrap up steepest three-week slump in two years, led by plunge in Amazon and Intel
text: The Nasdaq fell 3.4% this week, bringing its three-week drop to 8.8%, marking its worst stretch of that length since 2022. The selloff underscores investor concerns around forecasts for the back half of the year.

title: Major Retailers Under Scrutiny After Amazon Forecasts Weak Sales
text: Analysts are reportedly awaiting earnings reports from major retailers with interest after Amazon's latest results “sent a chill” through the sector. Amazon reported its results Thursday (Aug. 1), while Walmart will do so on Aug. 15, followed by Target and Kroger, Reuters reported Friday (Aug. 2).

title: Amazon's killer cloud growth can't make up for this more worrisome trend
text: Retailers have spent months warning of pressures on consumer spending. Now it looks like even Amazon.com Inc. isn't immune.

title: What We Learned From Amazon's Latest Quarterly Update
text: Amazon (AMZN) shares tumbled Friday, a day after the company posted second-quarter revenue that missed estimates and the company's guidance for the third quarter fell short of what analysts had expected.

title: Amazon (AMZN) Q2 Earnings Beat Estimates, Sales Rise Y/Y
text: Amazon's (AMZN) second-quarter results benefit from a solid momentum in AWS. Strength in Prime contributes well.

title: Amazon's stock flashes this downtrend warning for the first time in over a year
text: Shares of Amazon.com Inc. have fallen Friday below a widely followed long-term trend tracker, to flash a warning that a downtrend may have started.

title: Meta, Amazon, and Alphabet are spending big in a battle to dominate AI. It might not end well.
text: Big Tech executives admit they're spending a lot, maybe too much, on AI. But Meta and Alphabet leaders say the big spending is necessary to stay competitive.

title: Amazon sounds pretty worried about the economy for the rest of the year. And it's a bad sign for the rest of us.
text: Amazon's CFO said political events and the Olympics are distracting people from spending. While it sounds like an excuse, there might be some truth to his predictions for the rest of 2024.

title: 2 Warren Buffett stocks to buy after Berkshire Hathaway reduces stake in Bank of America
text: Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway (NYSE: BRK.A) has made a significant move by reducing its stake in Bank of America (NYSE: BAC) for the first time since 2019.

title: Amazon's Weak Sales Spoil Investors' Mood: ETFs in Focus
text: Like other tech giants, Amazon (AMZN) failed to impress investors with its second-quarter 2024 results. The online behemoth outpaced earnings estimates but lagged on revenues.

title: Why Amazon Stock Looks Weak After Q2 2024 Results
text: Amazon.com, Inc.'s strong focus on third-party merchants and advertising, to compete with Shopify, Google, and Meta, has stalled in growth. Revenue expectations were missed in the first half of the year, with shoppers shifting to cheaper goods and a fragmented marketplace making competition complex. Despite solid attention grabbed by groundbreaking content releases this year, there has been no substantial increase in online sales on the platform.

title: Why Amazon Stock Was Taking a Dive Today
text: Amazon's results were decent, but guidance was short of expectations. The company is seeing some cautiousness from consumers.

title: Amazon.com Stock Headed for Worst Day in Over 2 Years
text: Amazon.com Inc (NASDAQ:AMZN) is falling sharply on the charts today, following the company's lower-than-expected second-quarter revenue and disappointing current-quarter forecast.

title: Amazon Stock Analysis: Multiple Growth Catalysts Signal Strong Buy Opportunity

title: What Are the Hottest E-Commerce Stocks Right Now? 3 Top Picks.
text: The e-commerce scene has faced considerable challenges in recent years. With an inflation-hit consumer inclined to put their wallets away when it comes to bigger-ticket discretionary items, e-commerce firms have had to ride out the harsh waves in recent quarters.

title: Amazon shares tumble 12% after third-quarter outlook disappoints
text: Amazon shares tumbled on Friday, a day after the company reported a revenue miss and disappointing guidance for the second quarter. The company is navigating slower sales in its core retail business, and said the chaotic news cycle was partly to blame for its weak forecast.

title: Amazon Stock is Primed to Rebound Strongly After AI Bubble Bursts
text: An AI-inflated bubble is bursting in the market, and Amazon NASDAQ: AMZN is not immune, but don't take this as an end to the rally. A bubble is bursting, but this is not the last vestige of an old and tired market we're discussing.

title: Amazon sheds $200bn in brutal tech sell off but Apple bucks trend
text: Tech stocks are in for another worrying session on Friday, though Cupertino appears to be bucking the trend. Apple Inc (NASDAQ:AAPL, ETR:APC).

title: Amazon: This Is The Time To Be Greedy (Rating Upgrade)
text: Amazon's shares dropped 7% after Q2 earnings. The company saw strong Cloud growth, which accelerated 2 PP Q/Q. Operating income momentum in the Cloud and potential for incremental valuation gains make Amazon a strong investment. Amazon's guidance for Q3'24 calls for up to 11% top line growth.

title: Walmart and Amazon Step Up the Race for Digital Ad Spending
text: As Walmart and Amazon look to boost their margins through digital media sales, the two retail giants are sweetening the deal for potential advertisers.

title: Watch These Amazon Price Levels as Stock Drops on Sales Outlook
text: Amazon (AMZN) shares fell sharply in premarket trading Friday after the e-commerce giant reported weaker-than-expected quarterly revenue and issued light current-quarter guidance, as consumers opted to purchase cheaper products, lowering the average selling price in its core retail business.

title: The Top 3 Retirement Stocks to Buy Now: Summer 2024

title: The Top 3 Blockchain Stocks to Buy Now: Summer 2024
text: Investing in blockchain stocks may elicit a hard pass from some investors who believe that this is a gateway into cryptocurrency. It is used in peer-to-peer transactions that are one of the core tenets of digital currency.

title: Walmart's low price promise in focus after Amazon's warning
text: Walmart's "Everyday Low Price" promise will be put to the test when it reports quarterly results, after rival Amazon.com's warning that customers had turned bargain hunters, pressuring the online shopping behemoth to forecast a weak current quarter.

title: 3 Unstoppable Warren Buffett Stocks That Make for Sensational Buys in August
text: Warren Buffett has completely crushed the benchmark S&P 500 in the return column since becoming CEO of Berkshire Hathaway nearly 60 years ago. Even with the S&P 500 near an all-time high, phenomenal deals can still be found in the $400 billion portfolio Buffett oversees at Berkshire.

title: Amazon Q2 2024 Earnings Update
text: Amazon's revenue growth was driven by non-1P businesses, while advertising and AWS showed mixed performance. North America operating margins improved in core retail business, while international margins deteriorated due to increased spending. AWS reported strong revenue growth and high operating margins, while capital intensity and investments in Kuiper satellite project increased.

title: Amazon reports boost in quarterly profits but misses revenue estimates
text: Amazon reported a boost in its quarterly profits Thursday, but the company missed revenue estimates, sending its stock lower in after-hours trading.
